functions.name: Route Design & Alignment
functions.description: Develop and modify transit routes and alignments based on ridership demand, land use, and operational feasibility.

functions.name: Service Coverage Analysis
functions.description: Analyze geographic and demographic data to assess and optimize transit network coverage and accessibility.

functions.name: Public Engagement for Service Planning
functions.description: Facilitate community outreach, surveys, and public meetings to gather input on proposed service changes.

functions.name: Schedule Creation & Timetable Generation
functions.description: Develop detailed timetables for routes, including stop times, headways, and schedule variations by day type.

functions.name: Schedule Publishing & Distribution
functions.description: Disseminate timetables via digital, print, and open data formats for public and internal use.

functions.name: Holiday & Special Event Schedule Management
functions.description: Create and implement alternate schedules for holidays and special events.

functions.name: Runcutting
functions.description: Break down scheduled service into operator shifts (runs) while optimizing labor and regulatory compliance.

functions.name: Blocking
functions.description: Assign vehicle blocks for efficient vehicle utilization and schedule adherence.

functions.name: Labor Rule Validation
functions.description: Ensure run and block assignments comply with labor agreements, rest rules, and other constraints.

functions.name: GIS Data Maintenance
functions.description: Maintain spatial datasets for stops, routes, and service areas for planning and analysis.

functions.name: Spatial Accessibility Analysis
functions.description: Use GIS tools to evaluate walk access, catchment areas, and network connectivity for riders.

functions.name: Title VI Equity Mapping
functions.description: Map and analyze service equity for compliance with Title VI using demographic overlays.

functions.name: GTFS Feed Generation
functions.description: Produce and validate GTFS datasets for routes, schedules, and fare attributes.

functions.name: GTFS Feed Publishing
functions.description: Automate and manage public release of GTFS and GTFS-Realtime feeds.

functions.name: GTFS Change Auditing
functions.description: Track changes and version history of GTFS feeds for transparency and compliance.

functions.name: Fleet Location Tracking
functions.description: Monitor real-time locations of all vehicles using CAD/AVL systems.

functions.name: Schedule Adherence Monitoring
functions.description: Track and analyze on-time performance and headways using live AVL data.

functions.name: Historical Vehicle Data Analysis
functions.description: Archive and analyze historical location and performance data for service improvement.

functions.name: Vehicle Dispatching
functions.description: Assign vehicles and drivers to runs at start of service and in response to real-time needs.

functions.name: Service Adjustment
functions.description: Make live service adjustments for traffic, detours, incidents, and operator availability.

functions.name: Field Supervision Coordination
functions.description: Coordinate with field supervisors to manage operations and respond to issues.

functions.name: Incident Logging & Notification
functions.description: Log incidents and disruptions, trigger internal and external notifications.

functions.name: Detour Management
functions.description: Plan and activate detours for service disruptions and special events.

functions.name: Incident Response Coordination
functions.description: Coordinate with emergency and operations teams for incident mitigation and service restoration.

functions.name: Simulation Scenario Planning
functions.description: Model operational scenarios using digital twin and simulation tools for planning and training.

functions.name: Predictive Operations Analytics
functions.description: Use simulation outputs for demand forecasting, bottleneck prediction, and resource allocation.

functions.name: Emergency Operations Protocol Activation
functions.description: Activate and manage protocols for weather, disaster, and citywide emergency events.

functions.name: Interagency Emergency Coordination
functions.description: Coordinate with police, fire, and municipal agencies during emergency operations.

functions.name: Rider Account Management
functions.description: Administer customer accounts, balances, and account-based fare capping.

functions.name: Interagency Fare Integration
functions.description: Support cross-agency fare payment and clearing through integrated accounts.

functions.name: Fare Media Issuance & Inventory
functions.description: Issue and track fare media (cards, tickets, mobile passes) and manage inventory.

functions.name: Sales Channel Management
functions.description: Administer vending machines, retail, and digital sales channels for fare products.

functions.name: Contactless & Mobile Payments
functions.description: Enable and maintain open payment systems for mobile, NFC, and contactless transactions.

functions.name: Fare Equipment Operations
functions.description: Monitor, maintain, and upgrade fareboxes, validators, and vending machines.

functions.name: Cash Handling & Secure Collection
functions.description: Collect, secure, and account for cash revenues from fareboxes and retail locations.

functions.name: Fare Equipment Repair & Support
functions.description: Respond to equipment malfunctions and perform preventive maintenance.

functions.name: Revenue Reconciliation
functions.description: Reconcile fare revenue across all payment channels and devices.

functions.name: Clearinghouse Settlement
functions.description: Allocate revenues among multiple agencies in regional fare systems.

functions.name: Fare Policy Simulation & Analytics
functions.description: Model fare changes and analyze impacts on ridership and revenue.

functions.name: Fare Policy Configuration
functions.description: Set, update, and enforce fare structures, discounts, and capping rules.

functions.name: Fleet Inventory Management
functions.description: Track vehicle assets, assignments, lifecycle stage, and replacement planning.

functions.name: Procurement Tracking
functions.description: Track vehicle and equipment procurement, contracts, and warranties.

functions.name: Preventive Maintenance Scheduling
functions.description: Automate and track preventive maintenance for fleet vehicles and equipment.

functions.name: Corrective Maintenance Work Orders
functions.description: Create and manage work orders for repairs and corrective actions.

functions.name: Parts Inventory Management
functions.description: Manage parts inventory, reordering, and usage for maintenance operations.

functions.name: Facilities Maintenance Scheduling
functions.description: Schedule, track, and document maintenance for depots, stations, and support facilities.

functions.name: Facility Asset Inspection
functions.description: Conduct regular inspections and risk assessments of all non-vehicle assets.

functions.name: Predictive Maintenance Analytics
functions.description: Use telematics and condition monitoring to predict and prevent asset failures.

functions.name: Real-Time Asset Condition Monitoring
functions.description: Capture and analyze live data from sensors for vehicle and equipment health.

functions.name: TAM Plan Development
functions.description: Develop, update, and monitor the agencyâ€™s Transit Asset Management Plan.

functions.name: FTA Asset Reporting
functions.description: Report asset condition, performance, and investment needs to the FTA.

functions.name: Hazard Identification & Risk Assessment
functions.description: Proactively identify, log, and assess hazards in operations and facilities.

functions.name: Safety Committee Management
functions.description: Organize and document regular safety committee meetings and action plans.

functions.name: Safety Incident Reporting
functions.description: Report, document, and track incidents, accidents, and near-misses.

functions.name: Accident Investigation
functions.description: Conduct root cause analysis and corrective action tracking for accidents.

functions.name: Emergency Response Plan Maintenance
functions.description: Maintain and update emergency response and evacuation plans.

functions.name: Emergency Drills & Exercises
functions.description: Conduct regular training exercises for emergency preparedness.

functions.name: Security Camera & Surveillance Monitoring
functions.description: Monitor CCTV networks and respond to security events in real-time.

functions.name: Access Control Management
functions.description: Manage and audit access to secure facilities and operational areas.

functions.name: Safety Compliance Auditing
functions.description: Audit compliance with OSHA, FTA, and other safety standards.

functions.name: Safety Training Administration
functions.description: Manage ongoing employee safety training and certification records.

functions.name: HRIS & Employee Record Management
functions.description: Maintain employee records, job titles, pay rates, and HR documentation.

functions.name: Payroll Processing
functions.description: Process employee payroll including overtime, shift differentials, and deductions.

functions.name: Operator Shift Assignment
functions.description: Assign operator shifts and manage real-time coverage changes.

functions.name: Operator Bidding & Seniority Management
functions.description: Conduct and manage the shift bidding process in accordance with union rules.

functions.name: Employee Training & Recertification
functions.description: Schedule and track required training, licensing, and recertification for employees.

functions.name: Labor Contract Administration
functions.description: Track, interpret, and implement labor contracts and agreements.

functions.name: EEO & Workforce Compliance Reporting
functions.description: Maintain compliance with EEO and related workforce reporting requirements.

functions.name: On-Time Performance Analysis
functions.description: Analyze and report on-time performance at route, trip, and system levels.

functions.name: Headway & Frequency Monitoring
functions.description: Monitor headways and service frequencies for adherence to service standards.

functions.name: Ridership Data Analytics
functions.description: Collect and analyze ridership data for trends and productivity assessment.

functions.name: Service Productivity Reporting
functions.description: Generate reports on key productivity metrics, such as passengers per hour or mile.

functions.name: KPI Dashboard Management
functions.description: Develop and maintain dashboards for operational and financial key performance indicators.

functions.name: Regulatory Data Aggregation
functions.description: Aggregate operational, financial, and safety data from various systems to meet regulatory reporting requirements.

functions.name: NTD Submission & Audit Management
functions.description: Prepare, validate, and submit National Transit Database reports, and manage data quality audits or corrections.

functions.name: Enterprise Data Warehouse Administration
functions.description: Manage and optimize the agency's central data warehouse for analytics and business intelligence needs.

functions.name: Business Intelligence Tool Management
functions.description: Administer reporting, visualization, and analytics tools for internal and external users.

functions.name: System Integration Platform Operations
functions.description: Maintain and update integration platforms (middleware, APIs) to ensure secure, real-time system interoperability.

functions.name: API Lifecycle Management
functions.description: Develop, document, and maintain APIs for internal and external system consumption.

functions.name: Open Data Feed Publishing
functions.description: Automate and monitor the publishing of open data sets, including GTFS, GTFS-RT, and other agency datasets.

functions.name: Open Data Quality Assurance
functions.description: Validate and ensure the accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of published open data feeds.

functions.name: Cloud Resource Management
functions.description: Provision, monitor, and optimize cloud infrastructure resources for agency applications and data.

functions.name: Backup & Disaster Recovery Management
functions.description: Implement and test backup and recovery plans for critical IT systems and data.

functions.name: Data Governance Policy Development
functions.description: Define and update data governance policies, including data stewardship and ownership.

functions.name: Data Quality Monitoring
functions.description: Continuously monitor and remediate data quality issues such as duplication, missing data, or inconsistent formats.

functions.name: Title VI Program Reporting
functions.description: Prepare and submit Title VI program updates and reports, documenting service standards and public engagement.

functions.name: Equity Impact Assessment
functions.description: Conduct equity analyses for proposed service or fare changes to ensure nondiscrimination compliance.

functions.name: ADA Policy Implementation
functions.description: Implement agency policies and staff training for compliance with ADA in services and facilities.

functions.name: Paratransit Eligibility Compliance
functions.description: Monitor and ensure compliance with ADA eligibility and reasonable modification requirements.

functions.name: Environmental Impact Analysis
functions.description: Conduct environmental assessments for projects, including NEPA and air quality reviews.

functions.name: Emissions & Air Quality Reporting
functions.description: Collect and report on emissions, energy use, and other environmental performance metrics.

functions.name: Grant Compliance Documentation
functions.description: Maintain and submit documentation to demonstrate compliance with FTA grant conditions and requirements.

functions.name: Grant Audit Preparation
functions.description: Prepare for grant audits and reviews, including Triennial and State Management Reviews.

functions.name: NTD Asset Inventory Reporting
functions.description: Compile and submit asset inventory and condition reports to the National Transit Database.

functions.name: Service Data Validation
functions.description: Validate and cross-check service and ridership data prior to NTD submission.

functions.name: Paratransit Trip Booking
functions.description: Accept and schedule ADA and demand-response ride requests from eligible customers.

functions.name: Eligibility Certification Management
functions.description: Administer applications, renewals, and records for paratransit eligibility.

functions.name: Paratransit No-Show & Cancellation Tracking
functions.description: Monitor and report on no-shows, late cancellations, and take corrective action as needed.

functions.name: Microtransit Real-Time Dispatch
functions.description: Dynamically route and dispatch microtransit vehicles in response to real-time demand.

functions.name: Microtransit Service Performance Analytics
functions.description: Analyze performance, utilization, and rider experience metrics for microtransit services.

functions.name: MaaS Data Integration
functions.description: Integrate agency transit data with MaaS and mobility aggregator platforms.

functions.name: Third-Party Mobility Partnership Management
functions.description: Establish and manage first/last mile and other third-party transportation partnerships.

functions.name: GTFS-Flex Data Maintenance
functions.description: Create and maintain GTFS-Flex datasets for flexible and demand-responsive services.

functions.name: On-Demand Integration for Trip Planners
functions.description: Enable real-time on-demand options in agency and third-party trip planning tools.

functions.name: Station & Stop Asset Maintenance
functions.description: Schedule and track maintenance of stops, shelters, benches, signage, and accessibility features.

functions.name: Station Amenity Upgrades
functions.description: Plan and implement upgrades or new amenities at stations and stops.

functions.name: Passenger Display Installation & Maintenance
functions.description: Install and maintain digital passenger information signage at stops and stations.

functions.name: Audio/Visual Announcement Management
functions.description: Program and maintain PA and announcement systems for rider information and accessibility.

functions.name: Curbside Space Allocation
functions.description: Coordinate with municipal agencies to allocate curb space for buses, shuttles, and shared mobility.

functions.name: Transit Signal Priority Operations
functions.description: Implement and monitor transit signal priority at intersections for improved bus movement.

functions.name: Park-and-Ride Lot Management
functions.description: Operate and maintain park-and-ride facilities, including capacity, security, and amenities.

functions.name: Transit Hub Operations
functions.description: Manage multimodal transit centers, ensuring smooth transfers and customer amenities.

functions.name: Cybersecurity Policy Administration
functions.description: Develop and enforce cybersecurity policies, including staff training and awareness programs.

functions.name: Security Risk Assessment & Audit
functions.description: Conduct regular IT and OT system vulnerability and risk assessments.

functions.name: Network Firewall & Segmentation Management
functions.description: Implement and manage network security appliances, segmentation, and zero-trust models.

functions.name: Identity & Access Management
functions.description: Manage user authentication, authorization, and least-privilege access for IT and OT systems.

functions.name: SIEM & Security Monitoring
functions.description: Operate Security Information and Event Management systems for real-time threat detection.

functions.name: Cyber Incident Response Planning
functions.description: Develop, test, and activate incident response plans for cybersecurity events.

functions.name: Data Encryption & Privacy Controls
functions.description: Apply data encryption and privacy controls to protect sensitive and regulated data.

functions.name: Third-Party Data Protection Compliance
functions.description: Ensure vendors and partners meet agency data privacy and protection requirements.

functions.name: Climate Risk Assessment
functions.description: Identify vulnerabilities to climate-related risks for infrastructure and operations.

functions.name: Adaptation Strategy Development
functions.description: Develop and implement strategies to adapt transit operations and assets for climate resilience.

functions.name: Continuity of Operations Planning
functions.description: Create and maintain Continuity of Operations Plans (COOP) for disasters and major disruptions.

functions.name: Disaster Recovery Drill Execution
functions.description: Conduct drills and exercises to test and refine emergency and disaster recovery plans.

functions.name: Fleet Emissions Tracking
functions.description: Monitor and report on emissions and fuel use for agency vehicles to support sustainability goals.

functions.name: Energy Efficiency Program Management
functions.description: Develop and implement programs for energy conservation in facilities and transit operations.

functions.name: Environmental Performance Reporting
functions.description: Compile and publish environmental and sustainability performance reports and progress updates.

functions.name: Regulatory Environmental Compliance Auditing
functions.description: Conduct internal audits for compliance with environmental regulations and program requirements.

functions.name: Financial Transaction Processing
functions.description: Process accounts payable and receivable, general ledger entries, and fixed asset accounting.

functions.name: Financial Reporting & Reconciliation
functions.description: Generate periodic financial statements and reconcile accounts for transparency and compliance.

functions.name: Budget Preparation & Forecasting
functions.description: Develop annual operating and capital budgets, including scenario modeling and forecasting.

functions.name: Capital Project Financial Management
functions.description: Track capital program expenditures and performance against budgets and schedules.

functions.name: Procurement Planning & Solicitation
functions.description: Plan, draft, and publish procurements (RFPs, IFBs) for goods, services, and capital projects.

functions.name: Contract Award & Administration
functions.description: Manage contract negotiations, award, and ongoing compliance and vendor performance.

functions.name: Grant Application & Administration
functions.description: Prepare, submit, and manage grant applications, drawdowns, and performance reporting.

functions.name: Grant Milestone & Compliance Tracking
functions.description: Monitor grant project milestones, deadlines, and compliance obligations.

functions.name: Multi-Modal Trip Planner Administration
functions.description: Configure and maintain trip planning tools for transit and multi-modal journeys.

functions.name: Rider Information Content Management
functions.description: Maintain accurate route, schedule, and service data in all trip planning tools.

functions.name: Customer Feedback Capture & Logging
functions.description: Collect, log, and categorize feedback, complaints, and service requests from riders.

functions.name: Complaint Resolution Workflow
functions.description: Route, investigate, and resolve customer complaints and provide timely follow-up.

functions.name: Service Alert Communication
functions.description: Generate and publish service alerts, detour notifications, and other real-time updates to riders.
